metadata.Name: AceGPT
metadata.Description: AceGPT is a large language model tailored for Arabic, addressing the localization issue by incorporating further pre-training, instruction tuning, and RLAIF.
Provider: Shenzhen International Center for Industrial and Applied Mathematics
The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen
King Abdullah University of Science and Technology
metadata.Paper Title: AceGPT, Localizing Large Language Models in Arabic
metadata.Venue Title: The 2023 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing
Affiliations: Shenzhen International Center for Industrial and Applied Mathematics
The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen
King Abdullah University of Science and Technology
Shenzhen Research Institute of Big Data
metadata.Abstract: This paper presents AceGPT, a large language model localized for Arabic. It addresses the localization issue by further pre-training with Arabic texts, supervised fine-tuning with native Arabic instructions, and reinforcement learning with AI feedback using a reward model attuned to local culture and values. Comprehensive evaluations show that AceGPT achieves state-of-the-art performance among open Arabic LLMs across various benchmarks.
